articles.title: 2020 MLB Draft: Complete results tracker as Tigers take Spencer Torkelson; Orioles surprise at No. 2 - CBS Sports
articles.description: Here is our pick-by-pick analysis of the first round of the 2020 MLB draft
articles.content:
Emerson Hancock, RHP, Georgia
Hancock does not have Lacy's top-end potential because he does not have Lacy's two top-end pitches. He might have the higher floor, however, thanks to a well-rounded arâ€¦ [+1335 chars]
